World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 3 月 18 日星期一 18:18:56 GMT 120
Ukrainian shelling kills four members of one family in Russia's Belgorod, governor saysFour people were killed in Ukrainian shelling of the village of Nikolskoye in Russia's Belgorod region, which borders Ukraine, the local governor Vyacheslav Gladkov said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 16:22:41 GMT 23QNDQBKE5JUNCC6HNEZUI6XB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-shelling-kills-four-members-one-family-Russias-belgorod-governor-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
What Putin’s election win tells us about Russia todayPresident Vladimir Putin won a record post-Soviet landslide in Russia's election on Sunday, cementing his grip on power, though thousands of opponents staged a noon protest at polling stations and Western countries said the vote was neither free nor fair. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 16:12:09 GMT KYUC2J67FBIALPNS22AFJFBPLE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/takeaways-what-putins-election-win-tells-us-about-Russia-today-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel asks World Court not to order new measures over Gaza hungerIsrael has asked the International Court of Justice (ICJ) not to issue emergency orders for it to step up humanitarian aid to Gaza to address a looming famine, dismissing South Africa's request to do so as "morally repugnant". Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:53:31 GMT QUDSGXTOYFLFFMCTQGBQ324X7U https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-asks-world-court-not-order-new-measures-over-gaza-hunger-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东
Moldovan president launches campaign to promote EU referendumPresident Maia Sandu launched a campaign to promote an upcoming referendum on Moldova's push to join the European Union on Monday, calling on civil leaders to rally support for the country's accession to the 27-member bloc. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:38:47 GMT G4PUQGFB2ZNY3JN4KAAVQLIEEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldovan-president-launches-campaign-promote-eu-referendum-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Gunmen kidnap at least 87 in Nigeria's Kaduna stateGunmen in Nigeria have kidnapped at least 87 people, including women and children in Kaduna state, residents and police said on Monday, in a fresh attack after an armed gang seized 286 students and staff from a school in early March. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:33:59 GMT FIPKZK2MOFNBVBOTL3TU6DN7PU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/gunmen-kidnap-least-87-nigerias-kaduna-state-say-residents-police-2024-03-18/Garba Muhammad, Hamza Ibrahim世界非洲
Israeli forces kill 20 gunmen in Gaza's Shifa hospital, military saysIsraeli forces have killed 20 Palestinian gunmen in Gaza's Al Shifa hospital and apprehended dozens of suspected militants, the Israeli military said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:18:40 GMT E3XEW6UXBVOGHLAIW6DRAWLXTE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-forces-kill-20-gunmen-gazas-shifa-hospital-military-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东
EU council agrees on a 5 bln euro aid to Ukraine armed forcesThe European council on Monday ratified an agreement made last week by member countries to increase the European Union's support to Ukrainian armed forces by 5 billion euros ($5.44 billion) through a dedicated assistance fund, the council said in a statement. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:08:28 GMT DF6NB2LSHBN2RM7SUM6SSHOL24 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-council-agrees-5-bln-euro-aid-ukraine-armed-forces-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Colombia cops seize 7.3 million gallons of crude in raids on illegal refineriesColombian police have seized more than seven million gallons of crude oil in raids on illegal refineries, in an operation targeting production of bootleg fuel in Norte de Santander province, the police said in a statement on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 14:49:13 GMT HP5PYVFNOZOVLB3HVHHP3VQSOA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-cops-seize-73-million-gallons-crude-raids-illegal-refineries-2024-03-18/Oliver Griffin世界美洲
Canada parliament to vote on motion backing Palestinian statehoodCanadian legislators are due on Monday to vote on a non-binding motion backing Palestinian statehood that has drawn condemnation from Israel and that could deepen splits inside the ruling Liberal Party. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 14:18:00 GMT CN2SO74SM5N75CE3S74MDLEDNI https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-parliament-vote-motion-backing-palestinian-statehood-2024-03-18/David Ljunggren世界
Croatian President Milanovic barred for running for PM while still in postCroatia's Constitutional Court on Monday barred President Zoran Milanovic from running for prime minister in elections next month while still in office and said he would have to resign first. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 14:16:52 GMT PHT3XP5YNZNKPPAYZXHU4QOH6I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/croatian-president-milanovic-barred-running-pm-while-still-post-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Gaza far exceeds famine-level food shortages, mass death imminent, monitor saysExtreme food shortages in parts of the Gaza Strip have already far exceeded famine levels, and mass death is now imminent without an immediate ceasefire and surge of food to areas cut off by fighting, the global hunger monitor said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 13:49:05 GMT W4R23JE5EZIJTCXBI3DAK5YSBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-suffers-famine-level-shortages-mass-death-imminent-un-backed-monitor-says-2024-03-18/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Dan Williams, Aidan Lewis世界中东
